name: FCameraLookatTrackingSettings
doc: Settings to control the camera's lookat feature

LookAtTrackingInterpSpeed: Controls degree of smoothing. 0.f for no smoothing, higher numbers for faster/tighter tracking.
ActorToTrack: If set, camera will track this actor's location
RelativeOffset: Offset from actor position to look at. Relative to actor if tracking an actor, relative to world otherwise.
bEnableLookAtTracking: True to enable lookat tracking, false otherwise.
bDrawDebugLookAtTrackingPosition: True to draw a debug representation of the lookat location
bAllowRoll: True to allow user-defined roll, false otherwise.
